text: The Las Vegas Grand Prix is a motor racing event that is part of the Formula One World Championship. It currently takes place at the Las Vegas Strip Circuit in Paradise, Nevada, in the United States. The 2023 Las Vegas Grand Prix was the first Formula One race held in Las Vegas since the 1982 Caesars Palace Grand Prix. == Winners == ===By year=== Year Driver Constructor Report Max Verstappen Red Bull Racing-Honda RBPT Report George Russell Mercedes Report Source: Source: Source: Source: == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Formula One Grands Prix Category:2023 establishments in the United States
